data.name: iles
data.detailed_description: iles is a cool running breakthrough game, players play the role of a constant challenge to unlock new levels, with 50 levels of rich and interesting design. Players are surrounded by islands on various islands to do a variety of fancy cool running, and collect the scene on the candy, dodge a variety of negative props. The length of each level is less than 1 minute. The character will be prompted to win when he finds the candy, and the level will be scored according to the collection and time duration after the end. The candy obtained in the game can be used to buy skins and unlock the level editor. Level Editor: Provides players with the ability to create their own games.
data.about_the_game: iles is a cool running breakthrough game, players play the role of a constant challenge to unlock new levels, with 50 levels of rich and interesting design. The candy obtained in the game can be used to buy skins and unlock the level editor. Level Editor: Provides players with the ability to create their own games.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
